source: TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_SEQ_00<tab>Able Ant seems distraught at the absence of a friend.
target: TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_SEQ_00<tab>ラジアタのエイブル・アントは、親友の帰りを待っているようだ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_000<tab>Listen, can you help me look for a mate of mine? I've ventured as far as I dare, but there's been no sign of him.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_000なあ、親友を探すのを手伝ってくれ。
探しまわってるんだが、見つからなくて……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_001<tab>He just decided to set out one day for the Arms of Meed─ah, that's the name of a temple to the west of Ala Ghiri.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_001ヤツは、アラギリの西にある、
アームズ・オブ・ミードという名の、
ラールガー星導教の寺院跡に行くと言って、出て行った。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_002<tab>The path to get up there collapsed ages ago, but the stubborn bastard said he was going to climb over the rocks anyway...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_002だが、参道は、とっくの昔に崩れ落ちていて、
岩山を飛び越えないと、たどり着けない場所でな。
ヤツは、よじ登ってでも行くと言っていたが……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_003<tab>I can't help but feel that something bad has happened. If you've any way of reaching the temple, I'd appreciate knowing what's become of him─be it good news or no.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_003頼む、今すぐアームズ・オブ・ミードに向かって、
「赤い肌の大男」を探してみてくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_005<tab>Did you have a look around the Arms of Meed? My mate's a big bloke, about my size, so he shouldn't be too hard to spot.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_005今すぐアームズ・オブ・ミードに向かって、
「赤い肌の大男」を探してみてくれ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>The man lies dead, the victim of an attack by some wild creature...
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_SYSTEM_000_010すでに事切れている……。
魔物に襲われたようだ……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_020<tab>Well, did you find him? I've a mind to give that reckless bugger a good─
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_020おお、戻ったか……で、ヤツはどこだ？
話したいことが、たくさんあるんだよ！

source: TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_021<tab>...He's dead? Godsdammit. And damn Rhalgr in particular. My mate went to His temple to atone, but that's taking it a bit bloody far!
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_021なに……息絶えてたって……！？
そんな……ヤツは、贖罪のために寺院を目指したってのに、
ラールガー様……あんまりだぜ。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_023<tab>Knowing our countrymen were out there fighting and dying for our freedom, while we shuffled along like packbeasts for the Empire... It wears down a man's soul.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_023アイツは、ずっと悔やんでたんだ……。
同胞たちが懸命に帝国と戦い、血を流している間、
武器も持たずに、帝国に荷担する真似をしたことに……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_022<tab>When my friend heard how the Fist of Rhalgr disciples would perform hard labor at the temple to expunge their sins, he got it into his head to do the same.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_022あの寺院が、罪を犯した信徒が贖罪の荒業を行う場だと知って、
ヤツはすがる気持ちで飛び出したんだろう……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_024<tab>It's not like I was happy with our lot, either! But we were born under imperial rule─you did things their way, or you died.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_024俺だって、嫌でたまらなかった……！
でも、生きるには、仕方なかったんだ。
生まれたときから、帝国に支配されてたんだから……。

source: TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_025<tab>I'm not giving up. I'll bear the guilt and the glares of my countrymen, and live a life full enough for the both of us. Thank you for letting me know his fate.
target:
TEXT_STMBDZ911_02867_ABLEANT_000_025俺は、これからも、罪の意識や同朋の視線に負けずに、
しぶとく生き抜いてやる……ヤツの分までな！
ヤツを探してくれて、ありがとよ。
